lead_paragraph: Bouthaina Shaaban, speaking via Skype to a group including reporters near the White House, assailed the Obama administration and Western news media.

headline.print_headline: Top Aide to Assad of Syria Hits U.S. Leaders Where They Live
headline.main: A Top Aide to Assad Takes Syria’s Case to a U.S. Audience

snippet: Bouthaina Shaaban, speaking via Skype to a group including reporters near the White House, assailed the Obama administration and Western news media.
abstract: Dr Bouthaina Shaaban, Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad's top adviser, defiantly answers questions over Skype at anti-terrorism press conference; appearance is condemned by Obama administration, reacting to her accusations that United States has misrepresented her government's aims and has refused to cooperate with Russia to combat Islamic State.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
